Posts.Content: On 12/20/2006 Carolina wrote: Hi ladies - I have been on Arimidex for just about 2 years now.  I have now started experiencing back pain right across the middle of my back.  I doesn't begin to hurt until I've been up for at least 5-6 hours.  Sometimes it feels like it's just going to collapse!  Have any of you experienced this???  Thanks! Dear carolina          I have been on arimidex the past 3 years and yes I have severe back pain .I thought it was either my kidneys or just another side effect , 3 years later from agressive chemo and radiation .Mine feels like I am having periods again, the way my back use to feel once a month. But I went into change of life after 1st chemo.Let me tell you, it must be the drug !!Every month their is some   new side effect.. pain in the neck.headache itch,sore chest on same side  that I had mastectomy,( 4 years ago no).I blame every ache in my body on it especially my back.I know it is suppose to keep me alive, but the anxiety you get with it, i  almost stoped it for good.One day i had severe chest anxiety, and pains in my cheat I stopped it for one day myself and it seemed to work when i skipped a day.I told my oncologist he didn''t say anything.I hope you feel better soon sarah
Posts.Title: Arimidex and back pain

Posts.Content: On 12/20/2006 Carolina wrote: Hi ladies - I have been on Arimidex for just about 2 years now.  I have now started experiencing back pain right across the middle of my back.  I doesn't begin to hurt until I've been up for at least 5-6 hours.  Sometimes it feels like it's just going to collapse!  Have any of you experienced this???  Thanks! Hi carolina I have been on arimidex almost 5 years.Their will be all kind's of different pain... it seems like every so many months something new.I had the back pain but it wasn't continuous, it seems to be once a month..Now my neck is killing me..headaches you name it.but it maybe the only think keeping me alive..I wanted to throw it away 5..years ago..Good luck !!
Posts.Title: Arimidex and back pain
